scripts.generate:client: bun run generate:client:typescript && bun run generate:client:python && bun run generate:client:dashboard
scripts.generate:client:typescript: bun start http://localhost:4310 ../../clients/metorial-node/sdk/gen typescript && cd ../../clients/metorial-node/sdk/gen && bun run build
scripts.generate:client:dashboard: bun start http://localhost:4310 ../../clients/metorial-dashboard/src/gen typescript && cd ../../clients/metorial-dashboard && bun run build
